oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Approach to right-sided pings in the dairy cow
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gordon, Eric D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: right abomasal displacement
RDA
AV
right-side ping
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The diagnosis and approach to the right-sided abomasal displacement in the bovine can be frustrating for any dairy practitioner. Right-sided abdominal pings are varied and often troublesome to diagnose, but a systemic workup can assist the practitioner in successful identification and resolution of these cases. This article is a review of types of right-side abomasal displacements in the dairy cow, typical presenting signs, and approaches to correct diagnosis and positive outcomes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2020 Recent Graduate Proceedings; 44-46
